verses.verse: And <S%G5613><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> It Was <S%G1096><s%> Sailed <S%G321><s%> We, <S%G2248><s%> Having Drawn Away <S%G645><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Having Run Direct <S%G2113><s%> We Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%>, Cos, <S%G2972><s%> And On <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> Next Day <S%G1836><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Rhodes, <S%G4499><s%> And Thence <S%G2547><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Patara. <S%G3959><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Found <S%G2147><s%> A Ship <S%G4143><s%> Passing Over <S%G1276><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Phoenicia, <S%G5403><s%> Having Gone On Board <S%G1910><s%> We Sailed; <S%G321><s%>

<S%G398><s%> And Having Sighted <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Cyprus, <S%G2954><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Left <S%G2641><s%> It <S%G846><s%> On The Left <S%G2176><s%> We Sailed <S%G4126><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Syria, <S%G4947><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Brought To <S%G2609><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> Tyre, <S%G5184><s%> There <S%G1566><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> Discharging <S%G670><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lading. <S%G1117><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Found Out <S%G429><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples, <S%G3101><s%> We Remained <S%G1961><s%> There <S%G847><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Seven; <S%G2033><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Paul <S%G3972><s%> Said <S%G3004><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Go Up <S%G305><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

But <S%G3753><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> It Was <S%G1096><s%> We <S%G2248><s%> Completed <S%G1822><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Days, <S%G2250><s%> Having Set Out <S%G1831><s%> We Journeyed, <S%G4198><s%> Accompanying <S%G4311><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Wives <S%G1135><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> As Far As <S%G2193><s%> Outside <S%G1854><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City. <S%G4172><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Bowed <S%G5087><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Knees <S%G1119><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Shore <S%G123><s%>, We Prayed. <S%G4336><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Saluted <S%G782><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> We Went Up <S%G1910><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship, <S%G4143><s%> <S%G1565><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Returned <S%G5290><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Their <S%G3588><s%> Own Homes. <S%G2398><s%>

<S%G2249><s%> And We, <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Voyage <S%G4144><s%> Having Completed <S%G1274><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Tyre, <S%G5184><s%> Arrived <S%G2658><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> Ptolemais, <S%G4424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Saluted <S%G782><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> We Abode <S%G3306><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G1520><s%> ' With <S%G3844><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G3588><s%> On The <S%G1161><s%> Morrow <S%G1887><s%> Having Gone Forth <S%G1831><s%> And <S%G3588><s%> Those <S%G4012><s%> With Him <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> They Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Caesarea; <S%G2542><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> Of Philip <S%G5376><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Evangelist, <S%G2099><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven, <S%G2033><s%> We Abode <S%G3306><s%> ' With <S%G3844><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>
<S%G5129><s%> Now To This Man <S%G1161><s%> There Were <S%G2258><s%> Daughters <S%G2364><s%> Virgins <S%G3933><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Who Prophesied. <S%G4395><s%>

<S%G1961><s%> And Remaining <S%G1161><s%> We <S%G2257><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Many <S%G4119><s%> Came Down <S%G2718><s%> A Certain One <S%G5100><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judea, <S%G2449><s%> A Prophet, <S%G4396><s%> By Name <S%G3686><s%> Agabus; <S%G13><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Us, <S%G2248><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken <S%G142><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Girdle <S%G2223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Paul, <S%G3972><s%> <S%G1210><s%> And Having Bound <S%G5037><s%> Of Himself <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Feet <S%G4228><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Thus <S%G3592><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G435><s%> Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> This <S%G2223><s%> Girdle <S%G3778><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Shall Bind <S%G1210><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Deliver Up <S%G3860><s%> Into The <S%G1519><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Of The Nations. <S%G1484><s%>

And <S%G5613><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> We Heard <S%G191><s%> These Things, <S%G5023><s%> Besought <S%G3870><s%> Both <S%G2249><s%> We <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Of The Place <S%G1786><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Go Up <S%G305><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

<S%G611><s%> But Answered <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Do Ye <S%G4160><s%> Weeping <S%G2799><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Breaking <S%G4919><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Heart? <S%G2588><s%> I 1473 P-1NS For 1063 CONJ Not 3756 PRT-N Only 3440 ADV To Be Bound 1210 V-APN But 235 CONJ Also 2532 CONJ To Die 599 V-2AAN At 1519 PREP Jerusalem 2419 N-PRI 2093 ADV Am Ready 2192 V-PAI-1S For 5228 PREP The 3588 T-GSN Name 3686 N-GSN Of The 3588 T-GSM Lord 2962 N-GSM Jesus. 2424 N-GSM

And <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3982><s%> Not Being Persuaded <S%G1161><s%> He <S%G846><s%> We Were Silent, <S%G2270><s%> Saying, <S%G2036><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Be Done. <S%G1096><s%>
<S%G3326><s%> And After <S%G1161><s%> These <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%> Days, <S%G3778><s%> Having Packed The Baggage <S%G643><s%> We Went Up <S%G305><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

<S%G4905><s%> And Went <S%G1161><s%> Also Some <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Caesarea <S%G2542><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Us, <S%G2254><s%> Bringing One <S%G71><s%> ' With <S%G3844><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> We Might Lodge, <S%G3579><s%> <S%G3416><s%> A Certain Mnason, <S%G5100><s%> A Cypriot, <S%G2953><s%> An Old <S%G744><s%> Disciple. <S%G3101><s%>

Having Arrived <S%G1096><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> We <S%G2257><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> Gladly <S%G780><s%> Received <S%G1209><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren. <S%G80><s%>

And <S%G3588><s%> On The <S%G1161><s%> Following Day <S%G1966><s%> Went In <S%G1524><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> James, <S%G2385><s%> <S%G3956><s%> And All <S%G5037><s%> Assembled <S%G3854><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders. <S%G4245><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Saluted <S%G782><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> He Related <S%G1834><s%> ' One <S%G2596><s%> By <S%G1520><s%> One <S%G1538><s%> What Things <S%G3739><s%> Wrought <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ministry. <S%G1248><s%> His <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G3588><s%> They <S%G1161><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> Glorified <S%G1392><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%> And They Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G5037><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Thou Seest, <S%G2334><s%> Brother, <S%G80><s%> How Many <S%G4214><s%> Myriads <S%G3461><s%> There Are <S%G1526><s%> Of Jews <S%G2453><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Have Believed, <S%G4100><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Zealous Ones <S%G2207><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Are. <S%G5225><s%>

<S%G2727><s%> And They Were Informed <S%G1161><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Thee, <S%G4675><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Apostasy <S%G646><s%> Thou Teachest <S%G1321><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Among <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Telling <S%G3004><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Circumcise <S%G4059><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Children, <S%G5043><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Customs <S%G1485><s%> To Walk. <S%G4043><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Is It? <S%G2076><s%> Certainly <S%G3843><s%> Must <S%G1163><s%> A Multitude <S%G4128><s%> Come Together; <S%G4905><s%> They Will Hear <S%G191><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Thou Hast Come. <S%G2064><s%>

This <S%G5124><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Do Thou <S%G4160><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> We Say : <S%G3004><s%> There Are <S%G1526><s%> With Us <S%G2254><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> A Vow <S%G2171><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> Themselves; <S%G1438><s%>

These <S%G5128><s%> Having Taken <S%G3880><s%> Be Purified <S%G48><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Be At Expense <S%G1159><s%> ' For <S%G1909><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They May Shave <S%G3587><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Head; <S%G2776><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> May Know <S%G1097><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Of Which <S%G3739><s%> They Have Been Informed <S%G2727><s%> About <S%G4012><s%> Thee <S%G4675><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Thou Walkest Orderly <S%G4748><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Thyself <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Keeping. <S%G5442><s%>

<S%G4012><s%> But Concerning <S%G1161><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Who Have Believed <S%G4100><s%> Of The Nations <S%G1484><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Wrote, <S%G1989><s%> Judging <S%G2919><s%> No Such <S%G3367><s%> Thing <S%G5108><s%> To Observe <S%G5083><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> To Keep From <S%G5442><s%>, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Themselves <S%G5037><s%> Things Offered To Idols, <S%G1494><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, <S%G3588><s%> Blood, <S%G129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> What Is Strangled, <S%G4156><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fornication. <S%G4202><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> Having Taken <S%G3880><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Men, <S%G435><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Next <S%G2192><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Having Been Purified <S%G48><s%> Entered <S%G1524><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple, <S%G2411><s%> Declaring <S%G1229><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fulfilment <S%G1604><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Purification, <S%G49><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G3739><s%> Was Offered <S%G4374><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Offering. <S%G4376><s%>

But <S%G5613><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> Were About <S%G3195><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> To Be Completed <S%G4931><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> Having Seen <S%G2300><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple, <S%G2411><s%> Stirred Up <S%G4797><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Laid <S%G1911><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>

Crying, <S%G2896><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Israelites, <S%G2475><s%> Help! <S%G997><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5117><s%> This Place <S%G5127><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Everywhere <S%G3837><s%> Teaches, <S%G1321><s%> And <S%G2089><s%> Further <S%G5037><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Greeks <S%G1672><s%> He Brought <S%G1521><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple, <S%G2411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Defiled <S%G2840><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> This. <S%G5126><s%>

They Had Before <S%G2258><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Seen <S%G4308><s%> Trophimus <S%G5161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ephesian <S%G2180><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> They Supposed <S%G3543><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G2411><s%> Brought <S%G1521><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul. <S%G3972><s%>

Was Moved <S%G2795><s%> And <S%G5037><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Whole, <S%G3650><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Was <S%G1096><s%> A Concourse <S%G4890><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> People; <S%G2992><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Laid Hold <S%G1949><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Paul, <S%G3972><s%> They Drew <S%G1670><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Outside <S%G1854><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple, <S%G2411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Were Shut <S%G2808><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Doors. <S%G2374><s%>

<S%G2212><s%> But As They Were Seeking <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Kill <S%G615><s%> There Came <S%G305><s%> A Representation <S%G5334><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Captain <S%G5506><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Band, <S%G4686><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> Was In A Tumult <S%G4797><s%> Jerusalem; <S%G2419><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> At Once <S%G1824><s%> Having Taken With Him <S%G3880><s%> Soldiers <S%G4757><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Centurions <S%G1543><s%> Ran Down <S%G2701><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%> And <S%G3588><s%> They <S%G1161><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Captain <S%G5506><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Soldiers <S%G4757><s%> Ceased <S%G3973><s%> Beating <S%G5180><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul. <S%G3972><s%>
